attributes.action: I'd like all MP'S that voted for the cuts to ESA & PIP to live on the £73
attributes.background: I would like the MP'S that voted for the ESA cuts & changes to PIP to be made to live on £73 a week for 6 months, I'm registered disabled & know several other people who are also disabled,  the cuts will severely harm people like us

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament as a whole does not have the power to make MPs live on £73 a week.
